description: Named after the infamous Colorado mountain range where summer never seems to come around, their Never Summer Mountains Graphic Long Sleeve Tee provides everything you’d want for a hike through the range: the moisture management, temperature regulation, and odor resistance of Merino and the quick dry time of recycled polyester. Designed to help resist chafe in a relaxed fit so you can stay cool and comfortable at any elevation.
name: Smartwool Never Summer Mountains Graphic LS Tee - Unisex

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Recycled Polyester - Exclusive of Decoration
